Articles.Content:
Challenge! Go to eve and back. 

1: Get into your suns orbit.

2: encounter with eve.

3: Land on eve.

see you next for part 2!

Welcome aboard!

I moved this thread over to our Challenges subforum, and I suggest you have a look at the [Challenge Submission Guide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide) to help flesh out your challenge.

Landing on Eve is easy. Not knowing what part 2 might entail rather makes this part of the challenge null and void. Are we going to need a rover, do we have to return to orbit, will it need to be manned? Without knowing any of that kind of makes it difficult to decide what to send to complete part 1.
This does not sound like it was meant to be a "challenge", more a personal challenge for a mission report.
